## Installation

To install the development version of **biodiversityhorizons** from GitHub, you can run the following:

```r
# Install devtools package if you don't have it
# install.packages("devtools")


# Install the biodiversityhorizons package
devtools::install_github("uw-ssec/biodiversity-horizons")
